Header: Speaker signs Investigation Commission Amendment Act
Content: Speaker KaruJayasuriya has signed the Investigation Commission Amendment Act which was passed in Parliament. It will provide the opportunity to use commission reports as evidence. The Investigation Commission Amendment Act was passed in Parliament on the 22nd of this month. The Speaker signed the Act last evening empowering the Act. It will provide the opportunity to use evidence at the Investigation Commissions and the Commission to Investigate Bribery or Corruption. The Act will pave the way to speed up investigations.
